katello_log.title: Katello log format
katello_log.description: Log format used by katello and foreman as used in Satellite 6.

sample.line: [DEBUG 2015-05-20 12:22:19 main]  /Stage[main]/Certs::Candlepin/Exec[create candlepin qpid exchange]/unless: Failed: ConnectError: [Errno 1] _ssl.c:504: error:14094418:SSL routines:SSL3_READ_BYTES:tlsv1 alert unknown ca

[DEBUG 2015-05-20 12:22:19 main]  Exec[create candlepin qpid exchange](provider=posix): Executing 'qpid-config --ssl-certificate /etc/pki/katello/certs/java-client.crt --ssl-key /etc/pki/katello/private/java-client.key -b 'amqps://avl248.bcc.qld.gov.au:5671' add exchange topic event --durable'

[ERROR 2015-05-20 12:22:19 main]  qpid-config --ssl-certificate /etc/pki/katello/certs/java-client.crt --ssl-key /etc/pki/katello/private/java-client.key -b 'amqps://avl248.bcc.qld.gov.au:5671' add exchange topic event --durable returned 1 instead of one of [0]
[ INFO 2015-07-06 14:50:39 main] Puppet has finished, bye!
[ WARN 2015-07-06 14:50:33 main]  /Stage[main]/Foreman::Service/Service[foreman]: Skipping because of failed dependencies
[ 2015-11-12 15:50:12.1052 7038/7fca73550720 agents/Watchdog/Main.cpp:631 ]: All Phusion Passenger agents started!
2015-12-23 15:08:44 [I] Connecting to database specified by database.yml

2015-12-23 15:08:46 [W] step ae0fca86-8aee-410e-9508-e4729fb8ceb4:2 dropping event Dynflow::Executors::Abstract::Event[execution_plan_id: ae0fca86-8aee-410e-9508-e4729fb8ceb4, step_id: 2, event: Actions::Candlepin::ListenOnCandlepinEvents::Close, result: #<Dynflow::Future:0x0000000eb3f7a0>]

2015-12-23 15:08:49 [D]   Setting::General Load (1.6ms)  SELECT "settings".* FROM "settings" WHERE "settings"."category" IN ('Setting::General') AND "settings"."name" = 'fix_db_cache' ORDER BY name LIMIT 1
